refnamediv.refpurpose: the amount of time between Allied team respawns

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: g_bluelimbotime specifies the time interval in milliseconds between Allied respawns. This cvar is used for the actual calculations in-game and is latched, meaning it cannot be changed during a match. Mapscripts set this cvar, and the cvar overrides this as well. Consequently, should be used to set custom spawn times, and this cvar should not be used at all.
